6 Pams Way, Bar Harbor, ME 04609

$685,000

Property Type: Residential Bedrooms: 2 Baths: 2 Square Footage: 1,842 Lot Size (sq. ft.): 100,188 Status: Active

Description

First time on the market! This well-maintained home is currently used as a duplex but can easily be converted into a single family home. It is conveniently located near Acadia National Park, Town Hill amenities and easy access off island. The home is turnkey!
